title: Deductions and contributions
description: Employers often block deductions and contributions from certain checks (i.e. bonus checks), since they are calculated on a per-pay-period basis. Deductions and contributions include loan repayments, garnishments, benefits, etc. Taxes will be included regardless of what is chosen.

include.label: Make all the regular deductions and contributions.

skip.label: Block all deductions and contributions, except 401(k). Taxes will be included.
